project.title: Pool Funding
project.description:
What are your funding needs? Do you need to pay off debt?
Would you like to start a business?​ ​Maybe you want to buy a new car? ​
A simple daily 3 minute activity could help qualify you to pull $30,000 a month out of our Pool of Funds.
project.pageBottomText: Optional: Fundwise Video Course - This FREE Video Training Course covers the ins and outs and shows the proof of how this works. You can also get your own referral link to the course to share with others.
